selected_quotes: Flood of contradictory dark matter discoveries
The discovery of a new unidentified line in the stacked Xray spectrum of galaxy clusters.
.@DrPhiltill A previous paper ( has seen a similar excess in x-rays at the same frequency, in galaxy clusters. (2/4)
Is this a possible signal in X-rays of sterile neutrino dark matter? @ift_uam_csic @MultiDark

citation.title:
Detection of An Unidentified Emission Line in the Stacked X-ray spectrum
  of Galaxy Clusters

wikipedia.title: Sterile neutrino
wikipedia.summary: Sterile neutrinos (inert neutrinos) are hypothetical particles (neutral leptons – neutrinos) that do not interact via any of the fundamental interactions of the Standard Model except gravity.

wikipedia.title: XMM-Newton
